dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Léon Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of about 60,000 images of handwritten digits, where each image is of size 28 × 28. Each pixel value is either 0 (background) or 1 (foreground).
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Ziwei Liu
Ping Luo
Xiaogang Wang
Xiaoou Tang
dcterms:description: CelebA is a dataset of more than 200,000 face images of celebrities. The input images were cropped to a 64 × 64 RGB image, giving 64 × 64 × 3 = 12288 inputs per image.
dcterms:title: CelebA
